about_the_game:
Koi musubi soundtrack album
The content includes the following:

1.Game music 12 song, format wav.

2.NRG format files.

3. Digital music collection cover.

List of tracks:
01. Clearness
02. One Lazy Afternoon
03. The Queen's Waltz
04. The Clumsy Goddess
05. At the Night Market
06. A Lazy Afternoon
07. Aroma Diffuser
08. Promise on the Shore
09. Gaze in the Wind
10. Stardust on the Beach
11. rainforest
12. What She Forgot
